chinese: 一根香烟就可以引发一场火灾
english: just a cigarette could spark a fire

chinese: 读书可以充实我们的头脑
西瓜的零售价是两元一斤
english: the retail price of watermelon is two yuan per jin

chinese: 他在中国历史上是个臭名昭著的君主
english: he is a notorious emperor in chinese history

chinese: 小孩子们正高兴地和同龄人玩耍
english: the kids are playing happily with their peers

chinese: 在这个美丽的星系里有着数不清的恒星和行星
english: there are countless stars and planets in this beautiful galaxy

chinese: 她企图推动这块石头的无用功让感到可悲
english: the futility of her trying to move this large rock is saddening

chinese: 零是这些数字里较小的那个
english: zero is the minor one amongest these numbers

chinese: 因为在最后几秒的时间里得分，这位运动员激动得大叫起来
english: the player screamed with excitement as he scored in the final seconds

chinese: 强效药的效力是普通药的两倍
english: potent drugs might have twice the effect of normal ones

chinese: 土壤的主要成分包括水
english: the man composition of soil includes water

chinese: 这个男孩脱掉了鞋子，这样就能偷偷地溜出去了
english: the boy took off his shoes so he could sneak around

chinese: 雷暴对航班造成了严重影响
english: the thunderstorm greatly impacted on these flights

chinese: 老师评估完成了我的作品，给了我满分
english: my teacher evaluated my work and gave me a full mark

chinese: 这场大火是灾难性的，给这座教堂造成了巨大的损失
english: the fire was disastrous and caused great damage to the church
